mapper.insert: insert into Postscript( seq_protector, seq_doctor, seq_diagnosis, seq_animal, postscript_reporting_date, postscript_content, postscript_satisfaction, postscript_update_date ) values ( #{seqProtector}, #{seqDoctor}, #{seqDiagnosis}, #{seqAnimal}, now(), #{postscriptContent}, #{postscriptSatisfactionrating}, now() )
mapper.update: update postscript SET postscript_content = #{postscriptContent}, postscript_satisfaction = #{postscriptSatisfactionrating}, postscript_update_date = now() where seq_postscript = #{seqPostscript}
